page.title: 01LOWER HEATH-OUR D BLOCK
page.content: Lower Heath is mainly an area of {dairy farming.}There is one school that is the{oldest Primary school}in Shropshire.There is no village but there are a few hamlets called Fauls, Prees Green and Lower Heath.There is one{church}at Fauls and a{chapel}at Prees Green.Two main trunk roads run through Lower Heath;the{A49}from Chester to Shrewsbury and the{A442 from Whitchurch to Telford.There are no canals or railways.There are three small mixed woods in our area.There are no shops or pubs in the area, but there is one Post Office.{The people {who live in the area mainly work in a {job which is to do with farming.}Some of the houses in our area are over {two hundred years old,}and some are quite new.Every house has a garden and most people have pets.
